title: The confession or declaration of the ministers or pastors which in the United Provinces are called Remonstrants, concerning the chief points of Christian religion
author: Remonstrantse Broederschap.
notes: Translation of Confessio sive declaratio sententiae pastorum qui in Foederato Belgio Remonstrantes vocantur super praecipuis articulis religionis Christianae.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
